text: William Alfred Newsom III (February 15, 1934 â€“ December 12, 2018) was an American politician and lawyer. He was born in San Francisco, California. He was an administrator of the Getty family trust. He was the father of California governor Gavin Newsom. In 1975, Jerry Brown appointed Newsom to the Superior Court bench in Auburn (Placer County) and later to the state Court of Appeal in San Francisco, where he was until 1995. Newsom died on December 12, 2018, at his home, in San Francisco, California from ulcerative colitis, aged 84. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Lawyers from San Francisco Category:American judges Category:Politicians from San Francisco Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from ulcerative colitis
title: William Newsom
